title: Handkerchief, 1939
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative white handkerchief printed in pink and blue showing scenes in San Francisco including: Russian Hill, Nob Hill, Mark Hopkin's Hotel, Legion of Honor Palace, Civic Auditorium and other sites. Souvenir of the Golden Gate International World's Fair, 1939.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1939.
1939. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer. 1941-61-19.
